title: House & Land for Sale in Pandura
details:
Facing Galle Road with 42Ft road frontage
4Km from Panadura town, towards Wadduwa town
1.5Km to Wadduwa Town

This property with a 3 story house, built on 9 Perches of Land, has 106 more Perches to rear side of the house (adjoining) making a total of 115 Perches is available for sale

Since it faces the main gall road it is highly recommended for commercial projects such as Apartments, Supermarkets, Restaurants, retail & whole sale businesses, clothing shops or for any mix development project, Hotel project, Reception hall

Please call for more information
Pan Global Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd
